statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND log_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND mechanic_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%oil change%';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle_inventory WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM maintenance_history WHERE repair_cost > 1000);
DELETE FROM equipment_inventory WHERE status = 'Damaged' AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type='Scheduled Maintenance' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id IN (SELECT equipment_id FROM equipment_info WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company');
DELETE FROM maintenance_crew WHERE supervisor_id=(SELECT crew_id FROM maintenance_crew WHERE crew_name='John Doe');
